# Introduction

Vue Calendar Scheduler is a customizable calendar that allows you to display events with date and time.

The calendar also emits events when the user clicks on a day, an event or a time.

Events creation

Please note that the calendar does not include a way to create events. The idea is to allow developer to adapt the calendar to their own needs, and the use of events leaves the door open to custom implementations.
